Speaker: Note
Text: [Note: The Trump Campaign released a statement from the President at 12:30 pm ET on November 5, 2020. It is presented here verbatim, with no changes or edits.]

Speaker: Donald Trump
Text: "IF YOU COUNT THE LEGAL VOTES, I EASILY WIN THE ELECTION! IF YOU COUNT THE ILLEGAL AND LATE VOTES, THEY CAN STEAL THE ELECTION FROM US!"
